title: Azure DB (Microsoft Azure SQL Database)
subTitle: Managing scalable and secure cloud-based databases
overviewContent: Azure DB has been used to design, configure, and manage cloud-based relational databases with a focus on scalability, security, and performance. Responsibilities include integrating databases with other Azure services, monitoring system performance, and optimising queries and configurations to ensure efficient operation in distributed environments. The databases support multiple applications and dashboards, providing reliable and maintainable storage solutions while enabling seamless data flow across the enterprise.
